messages.message:
:question-block: I have a curiosity I would love y'all's help with, by way of a quick emoji-poll :smile:

If you'd be so kind as to select one of the emojis associated with the methods indicated in the question:

*Do you work with Cursor (or similar tooling) by way of dictates/mandates (*:lists:*) or conversation (*:speech_balloon:*)?*

Said another way, do you define and dictate its reality at the outset, or do you make requests and 'talk it out' as you go?

Thanks for helping me scratch the brain-itch. :slightly_smiling_face:

In my experience, its always a conversation (even if you start with a dictate). If you have well defined/concrete requirements and instructions at the beginning and also during follow ups, the conversation will likely go in a good direction.
